title: 求1.8.1只装了比狼好的纯净游戏包,我看帖装好多次了,都不明白
txt_content:

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
首先, 最好用較新版本... 目前比狼好是 2.99 版
看內附說明文件的安裝步驟... 

1) Make sure minecraft is not running.
2) Install Risugami's ModLoader (http://www.minecraftforum.net/viewtopic.php?f=1032&t=80246)
3) Install the client-version of Minecraft Forge (http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/514000-api-minecraft-forge/)
4) Open your minecraft.jar with Winrar or other program
5) Delete the META-INF folder in minecraft.jar (you should have already done this when you installed ModLoader)
6) Copy all the files and folders in this mod's MINECRAFT-JAR folder into your minecraft.jar (overwriting any existing files).
...
8) Profit!

簡單說就是... 
裝 ModLoader 以及 Minecraft Forge
刪除 META-INF
把 MINECRAFT-JAR 中的東西丟進 jar
另外, BTWConfig.txt 有需要的話, 放到 .minecraft
應該不會有問題啊...
